#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
int main()
{
	int n,q,x,y,ch=1,sum,i,j;
	scanf("%d %d",&n,&q);
	int a[n+1];
	int** b=(int **)calloc(q,sizeof(int*));
	for(i=0;i<q;i++)
		b[i]=(int*)calloc(101,sizeof(int));
	for(i=1;i<n+1;i++)
    {
        scanf("%d",&a[i]);
    }
    for(i=0;i<q;i++)
    {
        sum=0;
        scanf("%d %d",&x,&y);
        for(j=x;j<=y;j++)
        {
            if(b[i][a[j]]==0)
            {
                sum++;
                b[i][a[j]]=1;
            }
        }
        printf("%d\n",sum);
        ch++;
    }
    free(b);
	return 0;

}
